nodes.text: Clear and Present Dangers is a web enhancement published by Wizards of the Coast for Ultimate Adversaries. It was written by Owen K.C. Stephens and published on July 8, 2004.

Sure, our latest accessory, the new hardcover Ultimate Adversaries, is full of dozens of villains, creatures, droids, and other wily opponents ready to take on your heroes. But we just can't stop dreaming up more, so we've put together a web enhancement with three new dangerous creatures and a new template to turn any beast into a master hunter.
